metadata.title: CVE-2025-1020 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 134 and Thunderbird 134. Some ofthese bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that withenough effort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrarycode. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 135 and Thunderbird < 135.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
